questions.questionText: The tax system is all about balance between minimizing compliance costs and maximising revenue?
Is the available legislation in relation to the proposed GST satisfactory or do you feel need for more clarity?

answers.answer: No – Need a lot more clarity

questions.questionText: The taxability of the interstate transaction under the proposed GST is based on the following: Central GST ‘CGST’/ State GST – ‘SGST’ and Integrated GST – ‘IGST’ C-VAT model for interstate transactions Which of the above do you think is a better option??
Will GST affect any of the following?
Do you think that the proposed GST is a predominantly compliance tax or a technically oriented tax?
